scripts.dev: concurrently --names "common,backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "magenta,blue,green" "npm run dev:common" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=common && npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=common
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=backend && npm run format --workspace=frontend && npm run format --workspace=common
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
